name: Delirium (itch) (LyffLyff)
description:
Version: Alpha 0.1

Last updated: 01.11.2021

In this game you killed a medieval doctor/potion mixer, because he messed up medication for your mother, which caused her death.

You now have to take over his house and brewing business without getting caught.

You need to search through the home of the doctor to find recipes to then gather them and finish the order for your customers.

But watch out each month you have to pay a tax to the kingdom and if you don't do that people from it will make a visit and you don't wan't that to happen
